message.content: First, we need to know which Disney princesses have appeared on Broadway. Now, we need to determine which of these princesses have red hair. Cinderella has blonde hair, Belle has brown hair, Ariel has red hair, Jasmine has black hair, Elsa has blonde hair, and Anna has strawberry-blonde hair. Therefore, only one Disney princess on Broadway has red hair, and that is Ariel from The Little Mermaid. Therefore, the answer is (A) Yes.
